title: Bloomberg Markets: Frier on Twitter's #Bummer
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Frier on Twitter's #Bummer
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Sarah Frier Technology Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Twitter failed to attract more monthly users in the second quarter, spooking investors looking for evidence that the company is on a sustainable long-term growth path. The shares tumbled the most in nine months on Thursday, even as quarterly revenue topped analysts’ projections.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
